name: Rocs-Hardcore-Gleba
title: Hard Gleba
author: thesixthroc
description:
Tweaks to Gleba. Spoilage timers of Gleba items are 70% as long. Coal synthesis is unlocked earlier to enable handheld rockets to be crafted earlier, allowing the player to choose harder deathworld settings. For full details, see the mod portal page.

Other dependencies are intended to be included, but all are listed as optional for maximum customizability. To get the full experience, enable this mod via the Space Age: Hard Mode modpack.
